author: Ian Horswill
title: Debra Messing said Jeremy Piven shoved tongue down to her heart | The
text:
DEBRA Messing has revealed the thespian she most loathed starring with in the hit TV show Will & Grace and it is all about his kissing.
Messing , who starred alongside Eric McCormack in the eight year multi-award winning TV series, was asked to name her least favourite person on Will & Grace on Bravo TV’s Watch What Happens Live .
“You know who at the time I wasn’t a fan of? Jeremy Piven ,” Messing told show host Andy Cohen.
“You know why? You know I had to kiss a lot of boys on that show, right? We we’re rehearsing, and the very first day of rehearsal he shoved his tongue all the way down to my heart.
“I was just like ‘wow!’ And he goes ‘Yeah ... yeah. Yep, that’s it, I’m in. I’m in’.”
'He shoved his tongue right down to my heart' ... Jeremy Piven's character tries to set up a threesome with Debra Messing and Maria Pitillo in TV comedy Will & Grace. Picture: NBC / NBCU Source: Supplied
Jeremy Piven's kiss with Debra Messing
The episode was called Love Plus One in which Piven tried to coerce Messing into having a threesome with former actor Maria Pitillo , who played Audrey Timmonds in the 1998 film Godzilla .
Ground-breaking TV ... Actor Eric McCormack and Debra Messing in Will & Grace. Source: News Limited
Messing added that she told Piven, who stars in Entourage and in the TV series Mr Selfridge ,
to take the kiss scene easy, but he did the same ‘deep throat’ thing every take.
“I was just like ‘this is comedy — we don’t really go that deep’. And every time he went for it.”
“He didn’t ask, I didn’t give him any sort of (signal). It was just like ‘I’m here, I get to do this ... I’m gonna do it’.”
‘I’m here, I get to do this ... I’m gonna do it’ ... Jeremy Piven as Ari Gold with Billy Bob Thornton and Haley Joel Osment in the movie Entourage. Source: Supplied
Messing also revealed that Harry Connick Jr, who played her eventual husband Leo in the show, was her favourite.
Originally published as ‘Shoved tongue down to my heart’
